batchgetchannel.name: BatchGetChannel
batchgetchannel.description: Grants permission to get multiple channels simultaneously by channel ARN

batchgetstreamkey.name: BatchGetStreamKey
batchgetstreamkey.description: Grants permission to get multiple stream keys simultaneously by stream key ARN

batchstartviewersessionrevocation.name: BatchStartViewerSessionRevocation
batchstartviewersessionrevocation.description: Grants permission to perform StartViewerSessionRevocation on multiple channel ARN and viewer ID pairs simultaneously

createchannel.name: CreateChannel
createchannel.description: Grants permission to create a new channel and an associated stream key

createencoderconfiguration.name: CreateEncoderConfiguration
createencoderconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new encoder configuration

createingestconfiguration.name: CreateIngestConfiguration
createingestconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new ingest configuration

createparticipanttoken.name: CreateParticipantToken
createparticipanttoken.description: Grants permission to create a participant token

createplaybackrestrictionpolicy.name: CreatePlaybackRestrictionPolicy
createplaybackrestrictionpolicy.description: Grants permission to create a playback restriction policy

createrecordingconfiguration.name: CreateRecordingConfiguration
createrecordingconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a a new recording configuration

createstage.name: CreateStage
createstage.description: Grants permission to create a stage

createstorageconfiguration.name: CreateStorageConfiguration
createstorageconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new storage configuration

createstreamkey.name: CreateStreamKey
createstreamkey.description: Grants permission to create a stream key

deletechannel.name: DeleteChannel
deletechannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel and channel's stream keys

deleteencoderconfiguration.name: DeleteEncoderConfiguration
deleteencoderconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an encoder configuration for the specified ARN

deleteingestconfiguration.name: DeleteIngestConfiguration
deleteingestconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an ingest configuration for the specified ARN

deleteplaybackkeypair.name: DeletePlaybackKeyPair
deleteplaybackkeypair.description: Grants permission to delete the playback key pair for a specified ARN

deleteplaybackrestrictionpolicy.name: DeletePlaybackRestrictionPolicy
deleteplaybackrestrictionpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the playback restriction policy for a specified ARN

deletepublickey.name: DeletePublicKey
deletepublickey.description: Grants permission to delete the public key for the specified ARN

deleterecordingconfiguration.name: DeleteRecordingConfiguration
deleterecordingconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a recording configuration for the specified ARN

deletestage.name: DeleteStage
deletestage.description: Grants permission to delete the stage for a specified ARN

deletestorageconfiguration.name: DeleteStorageConfiguration
deletestorageconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an storage configuration for the specified ARN

deletestreamkey.name: DeleteStreamKey
deletestreamkey.description: Grants permission to delete the stream key for a specified ARN

disconnectparticipant.name: DisconnectParticipant
disconnectparticipant.description: Grants permission to disconnect a participant from for the specified stage ARN

getchannel.name: GetChannel
getchannel.description: Grants permission to get the channel configuration for a specified channel ARN

getcomposition.name: GetComposition
getcomposition.description: Grants permission to get the composition for the specified ARN

getencoderconfiguration.name: GetEncoderConfiguration
getencoderconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the encoder configuration for the specified ARN

getingestconfiguration.name: GetIngestConfiguration
getingestconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the ingest configuration for the specified ARN

getparticipant.name: GetParticipant
getparticipant.description: Grants permission to get participant information for a specified stage ARN, session, and participant

getplaybackkeypair.name: GetPlaybackKeyPair
getplaybackkeypair.description: Grants permission to get the playback keypair information for a specified ARN

getplaybackrestrictionpolicy.name: GetPlaybackRestrictionPolicy
getplaybackrestrictionpolicy.description: Grants permission to get the playback restriction policy for a specified ARN

getpublickey.name: GetPublicKey
getpublickey.description: Grants permission to get the public key for the specified ARN

getrecordingconfiguration.name: GetRecordingConfiguration
getrecordingconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the recording configuration for the specified ARN

getstage.name: GetStage
getstage.description: Grants permission to get stage information for a specified ARN

getstagesession.name: GetStageSession
getstagesession.description: Grants permission to get stage session information for a specified stage ARN and session

getstorageconfiguration.name: GetStorageConfiguration
getstorageconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the storage configuration for the specified ARN

getstream.name: GetStream
getstream.description: Grants permission to get information about the active (live) stream on a specified channel

getstreamkey.name: GetStreamKey
getstreamkey.description: Grants permission to get stream-key information for a specified ARN

getstreamsession.name: GetStreamSession
getstreamsession.description: Grants permission to get information about the stream session on a specified channel

importplaybackkeypair.name: ImportPlaybackKeyPair
importplaybackkeypair.description: Grants permission to import the public key

importpublickey.name: ImportPublicKey
importpublickey.description: Grants permission to import a public key

listchannels.name: ListChannels
listchannels.description: Grants permission to get summary information about channels

listcompositions.name: ListCompositions
listcompositions.description: Grants permission to get summary information about compositions

listencoderconfigurations.name: ListEncoderConfigurations
listencoderconfigurations.description: Grants permission to get summary information about encoder configurations

listingestconfigurations.name: ListIngestConfigurations
listingestconfigurations.description: Grants permission to get summary information about ingest configurations

listparticipantevents.name: ListParticipantEvents
listparticipantevents.description: Grants permission to list participant events for a specified stage ARN, session, and participant

listparticipantreplicas.name: ListParticipantReplicas
listparticipantreplicas.description: Grants permission to get summary information about participant replicas

listparticipants.name: ListParticipants
listparticipants.description: Grants permission to list participants for a specified stage ARN and session

listplaybackkeypairs.name: ListPlaybackKeyPairs
listplaybackkeypairs.description: Grants permission to get summary information about playback key pairs

listplaybackrestrictionpolicies.name: ListPlaybackRestrictionPolicies
listplaybackrestrictionpolicies.description: Grants permission to get summary information about playback restriction policies

listpublickeys.name: ListPublicKeys
listpublickeys.description: Grants permission to get summary information about public keys

listrecordingconfigurations.name: ListRecordingConfigurations
listrecordingconfigurations.description: Grants permission to get summary information about recording configurations

liststagesessions.name: ListStageSessions
liststagesessions.description: Grants permission to list stage sessions for a specified stage ARN

liststages.name: ListStages
liststages.description: Grants permission to get summary information about stages

liststorageconfigurations.name: ListStorageConfigurations
liststorageconfigurations.description: Grants permission to get summary information about storage configurations

liststreamkeys.name: ListStreamKeys
liststreamkeys.description: Grants permission to get summary information about stream keys

liststreamsessions.name: ListStreamSessions
liststreamsessions.description: Grants permission to get summary information about streams sessions on a specified channel

liststreams.name: ListStreams
liststreams.description: Grants permission to get summary information about live streams

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to get information about the tags for a specified ARN

putmetadata.name: PutMetadata
putmetadata.description: Grants permission to insert metadata into an RTMP stream for a specified channel

startcomposition.name: StartComposition
startcomposition.description: Grants permission to start a new composition

startparticipantreplication.name: StartParticipantReplication
startparticipantreplication.description: Grants permission to start a new participant replication

startviewersessionrevocation.name: StartViewerSessionRevocation
startviewersessionrevocation.description: Grants permission to start the process of revoking the viewer session associated with a specified channel ARN and viewer ID

stopcomposition.name: StopComposition
stopcomposition.description: Grants permission to stop the composition for the specified ARN

stopparticipantreplication.name: StopParticipantReplication
stopparticipantreplication.description: Grants permission to stop the participant replication for the specified ARN

stopstream.name: StopStream
stopstream.description: Grants permission to disconnect a streamer on a specified channel

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for a resource with a specified ARN

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags for a resource with a specified ARN

updatechannel.name: UpdateChannel
updatechannel.description: Grants permission to update a channel's configuration

updateingestconfiguration.name: UpdateIngestConfiguration
updateingestconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update ingest configuration for a specified ARN

updateplaybackrestrictionpolicy.name: UpdatePlaybackRestrictionPolicy
updateplaybackrestrictionpolicy.description: Grants permission to update a playback restriction policy for a specified ARN

updatestage.name: UpdateStage
updatestage.description: Grants permission to update a stage's configuration
